to jbernie
F*ck you! Full language packs = ~9GB.

Works great for me, except for two nags:
- Contains the annoying "Failed to create D3D device" bug, thus I have to start it using the '-dxlevel 81' parameter.
- Keeps booting the 1366 resolution. With each start, I have to set 1920x1080 again. Control changes however (like crouch=c) are kept.

But hey, even the lips are moving ;), so a big thankyou, obrigado, благодаря, děkuji, tak, dank u, kiitos, merci, danke, σας ευχαριστώ, köszönöm, grazie, ありがとう, 감사합니다, takk, dziękuję, obrigada, mulţumesc, спасибо, gracias, tack, 谢谢,謝謝, ขอขอบคุณคุณ and teşekkür!
Well, and as it turns out, I got to re-install the game week for week, obviously due to a hidden copy protection (crash while initializing).

Hey, can someone help me out?
I keep getting the error "No permissions to run Episodic." when i run this program, I have been having this problem with every Hl2 Episode 1 torrent so far, and it is really getting on my nerves. I am currently running this game on an administrator account and i always right click and run as administrator.  Please help me.
